payment_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Payment via {bank} is possible, but due to sanctions, some banks in Kyrgyzstan may restrict Mir and transfers via Russian banks (Sberbank, Tinkoff, VTB). Use the bank's app for payment.
payment_instruction: Payment via {bank} for {amount} KGS. Open the {bank} app or visit the nearest branch to complete the transaction.
requisites_caption: Requisites for payment via {bank} for {amount} KGS
upload_receipt_prompt: Please upload a photo of the payment receipt or skip.
error_not_a_photo: ‚ö†Ô∏è This is not a photo. Please send a photo of the receipt.
error_invalid_name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Name must be at least 2 characters long and contain only letters or spaces.
error_invalid_address: ‚ö†Ô∏è Address must be at least 5 characters long.
error_generic: ‚ö†Ô∏è An error occurred. Please try again later.
error_image_not_found: ‚ö†Ô∏è Image with requisites for {bank} not found. Please contact support.
faq_how_to_pay_answer: Press 'Pay', select a bank, enter the amount, and follow the instructions.
faq_where_requisites_answer: After selecting a bank and amount, the bot will send a photo with the requisites.
support_contacted: Message sent to support. We will contact you soon!
